document_data.caption: Parwyyd Hanifar casts ''disintegrate'' to destroy the Great Door.
document_data.name: Disintegrate
document_data.mainbody: '''''Disintegrate''''', originally called '''''Aksa's disintegrate''''', was an [[alteration]] or [[transmutation]] spell that created a thin green ray that made a creature or an object of a certain size vanish,
document_data.Effect:
Older versions of ''disintegrate'' made the target disappear no matter if it was a creature, or magical matter, or a 1" cubic volume of other material.

The newer versions spell struck and injured a target, and if killed, the ray caused the creature to disintegrate into a pile of fine dust, although any equipment was not affected. The ray could also disintegrate as much as one 10-foot-cube of nonliving matter, even objects constructed entirely of force, but it could not affect magical effects, such as a ''[[globe of invulnerability]]''. Only one creature or object could be affected per casting.

Some observers claimed that they could smell ozone and feel electrical charge in the air before the spell was discharged by a mage about to cast it.

The spell has a range of over 100' (30 m).
document_data.Components: The spell required [[Verbal component|verbal]], [[Somatic component|somatic]] and material components. In order to cast the spell, the caster had to use a lodestone and a pinch of dust.
